definition: legend/folklore/to repeat from mouth to mouth/they say that...
to pass on/to spread/to transmit/to infect/to transfer/to circulate/to conduct (electricity)
to speak/to say/to explain/to scold/to tell off/a theory (typically the last character in a compound, as in 日心說|日心说 heliocentric theory)

sentences.english: There is no doubt he is the "Rock Star" CEO.
sentences.chinese: 毫无疑问，他就是传说中的“摇滚明星式”CEO。

sentences.english: A moving legend was often told around the area of Zhongxian County, Sichuan Province.
sentences.chinese: 在四川忠县一带，则流传着一则感人肺腑的传说。

sentences.english: 13 consider well her ramparts, view her citadels, that you may tell of them to the next generation.
sentences.chinese: 细看他的外郭，察看他的宫殿，为要传说到后代。

sentences.english: Which wise men have told from their fathers, and have not hid it
sentences.chinese: 就是智慧人从列祖所受，传说而不隐瞒的。

sentences.english: This fame have a metempsychosis again.
sentences.chinese: 传说在花江峡谷开始了又一次轮回。

sentences.english: Many explorers hoped to discover Eldorado, the fabled City of Gold.
sentences.chinese: 冒险家都梦想找到埃尔多拉多这个传说中的黄金之城。

sentences.english: You can also make a day tour to Penglai where the Eight immortals were said trip sea.
sentences.chinese: 也可以去蓬莱一日游，那是传说中八仙过海的地方呢。

sentences.english: And tradition identifies this as the site of Sodom and Gomorrah.
sentences.chinese: 传说认为这里是索多玛城和蛾摩拉城旧址。

sentences.english: All Sagas are rumoured to be 25pts each.
sentences.chinese: 传闻所有传说应该为25分每个。

sentences.english: There is an interesting folktale about how the order of the 12 animals was determined.
sentences.chinese: 民间有种关于12生肖顺序的有趣传说。

sentences.english: Sauron, who does figure into those tales, was the most powerful of his servants.
sentences.chinese: 在传说中三世纪时出现的索隆是他最强大的仆人。

sentences.english: Dragon is one of the most sacred figures in ancient folk tales of the Bai People.
sentences.chinese: 龙是古代白族民间传说中最受崇拜的神灵之一。

sentences.english: Even today, romantic lore commonly identifies chocolate as an aphrodisiac.
sentences.chinese: 浪漫的民间传说通常认为巧克力是一种催情剂。

sentences.english: And there are also a multitude of sceneries and stories related to Jigong.
sentences.chinese: 与济公相关的民俗风物传说也十分丰富。

sentences.english: There are many legends concerning the origins of Lantern Festival.
sentences.chinese: 关于元宵节的来历有很多传说。

sentences.english: The legend of Monalun is one of the Mongolian famous historical legends.
sentences.chinese: 莫挐伦传说是蒙古族著名的历史传说之一。

definition: to pass on/to hand down/tradition has it that .../according to legend
the distant past/ancient times/antiquity/early historical times
classical story or quote from the literature/the story behind sth
it is rumored that .../it is reported that ...
to add parallels and interpretations (to a story etc)/to develop and embellish/to interpret (often in a strained manner)
